author: cnbc.com
title: Central Securities Corporation Releases Annual Report to Stockholders as of December 31, 2017
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Central Securities Corporation (NYSE American:CET), a closed-end investment company, today released its Annual Report to Stockholders for the year ended December 31, 2017.
Figures as of December 31, 2017, compared with those of one year ago, are as follows:
December 31, December 31, 2017
2016
Net assets per common share $32.86 $27.12 Net assets $826,331,789 $674,683,352 Shares outstanding 25,143,616 24,881,665 Additional details are available at www.centralsecurities.com .
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180212006288/en/
Central Securities Corporation
Marlene A. Krumholz, 212-698-2020
Secretary
Source: Central Securities Corporation
